title: Royal Road - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Aristocracy   Army   Army Building   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Calm Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Childcare   Confident Protagonist   Cute Children   Determined Protagonist   Empires   Generals   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdom Building   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Modern Knowledge   Nobles   Persistent Love Interests   Politics   Power Couple   Power Struggle   Pragmatic Protagonist   Rebellion   Royalty   Sickly Characters   S*aves   Slow Romance   Straight Uke   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Transmigration   Wars   Younger Love Interests
author: 捂脸大笑
description:
After dying in the line of duty, Liang Feng inexplicably transmigrated into the Western Jin Dynasty – that short-lived dynasty that succeeded the chaos of the Three Kingdoms and preceded the reign of the Sixteen Barbarian Kingdoms.

Trapped in a beautiful but fragile body, would he use his looks to fake his way into being a “famous scholar?” Or would he raise an army and plant fields to fight the barbarians for dominance over the Middle Kingdom?

With a young wolfdog in tow, Liang Feng proves that he can do it all!>
